Docs.summary: Gets the name of the JSON property in a Stripe WebHook request body indicating it carries a live mode event.
Docs.value: if this is a live mode event; otherwise, this is a test mode event.
Docs.remarks: Stripe sends test mode events i.e. uses test data with notification identifiers other than .

Docs.summary: Gets the key of a configuration value indicating the Stripe receiver should flow test events to Stripe actions. Configuration value, if any, should parse as a . If that parsed configuration value is , the action will receive test events. Otherwise, the receiver short-circuits test events.
